Class HttpProxySelector

java.lang.Object
java.net.ProxySelector
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.HttpProxySelector
public class HttpProxySelector extends ProxySelector
Proxy selector for HTTP clients.

Tim Johnson, Douglas Lau
